## Setup
```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(gapminder)
library(tidyverse)
```

## _Exercise 1_ Basic dplyr
__1.1__
```{r echo=FALSE}
filter(gapminder, year== 1972 | year== 1977, country== "China" | country=="Canada" | country=="Japan") %>% 
knitr::kable()
```

__1.2__
```{r echo=FALSE}
filter(gapminder, year== 1972 | year== 1977, country== "China" | country=="Canada" | country=="Japan") %>% 
  select(country, gdpPercap) %>% 
  knitr::kable()
```

__1.3__
```{r echo=FALSE}
gapminder %>% 
  group_by(country) %>% 
  mutate(increaseInlifeExp = c(0, diff(lifeExp, 1))) %>% 
  filter(increaseInlifeExp < 0) %>% 
  DT::datatable()
```


__1.4__
```{r echo=FALSE}
gapminder %>% 
  group_by(country) %>% 
  filter(gdpPercap == max(gdpPercap)) %>% 
  DT::datatable()
```

__1.5__


```{r echo=FALSE}
gapminder %>%
  filter(country == "Canada") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(lifeExp, gdpPercap)) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_y_log10("GDP per capita", labels = scales::dollar_format()) +
  xlab("Life Expectancy")
```
